div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo primo die mensis Januarij Anno quingentesimo Nono

The said day It was Statut and ordanit be the prouost bailyeis
and Counsaile that al the baxtaris of this burgh' sall bak tua penny
breid' of quheit cleyne stuf fresche weilboutit and bakin weying
xxxtj vncez and penny breid' weying xv vncez' vndir the pane of
brekin of common ordinance nocht withstanding the pais' gevin to thame
of xxxij vncez'

The said day Katherin Cullan the Relict' of vmquhile Johnne'
Duncansone warnit and chargit georg tailyeour to flit and Remove
out of the land' quhilkis he Inhabitis at the terme of Witsonday
nixt hereftir folloving In presens of the prouost and bailyeis

The said day Wilyeame Murray grantit him to pay xiij
s' iiij d' to Johnne of mar for Robert murray

The said day the prouost and bailyeis ordanit Androw gordone
baxter to pay to ser thomas bynne xxtj s' quhilkis he allegeit
pait to Johnne fif

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis Januarij anno
quo supra

The said' day Jonhne henry quhitfischear' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' James
Colisone forspekar for tribulance of thome beg fischear' for the quhilk he was in Amerciament
of the Court and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum Ande the saide
thomas quyt of ale tribulance of the saide Jonhne et cetera

The said' day Jonhne henry was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James Colisone for
spekar for tribulance of Jonhne laysk / and the saide Jonhne laysk was conuict' be
the said' assis' for tribulance of the said' Jonhne henry for the quhilkis Ilkan
of thame was in Amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' day Jonhne laysk was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James Colisone
forspekar for tribulance of Elspat Weschear' et cetera for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament
of the Court

The saide day alexander burnat grauntit to put xviij s' in the handis of gilbert menyeis
prouest quhile It be seyne and Considerit how mekle' clays' spyne tuk for the
fiwe hidis pertening to Donald' Wilman Ande gif the saide hidis gaf mair' the
saide Alexander sale recompens' and pay the excrescence atour' of xviij s' Ande gif
thai gaf les' It salbe recompensit agane to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die mensis Janua
rij Anno domini quo supra

Eodem die Johannes dous' gallicus sub deo rector cuiusdam nauis le py de
Deip vocatis concessit se bene contenta et plenarie per soltuo per manus Jacobi
Colisone Johannis crag Dauid ruthirfuyrde et Dauid greg conburgensium dicti burgi ac suorum
Consortum de omnibus et singulis mercantiis suis in dicta nauj ad portam abirdonensis
portatis videlicet de vnio et dolo sale sibi aliis venditis exceptis triscentum
et viginti septem et dimidio francis monete francie pro naulo bonorum in eadem
nunc existens ac Cartatus de quibus exonerauit prefatum Jacobum Johannem Crag Dauid
ruthirfurde et dauid greg heredes suos executores et assignatos pro se heredibus executoribus et assignatis
Imperpetuum Cum pacto non petendum Exceptis taxat triscentum viginti
Septem francis Cum dimidio pro naulo suarum mercantiarum in N eadem Nauj locati / quos
proprietatem et possessores huismodi bonorum pro naulo eorundem ut premittitur eidem nauis
patrono fidelitatem refundent infra Opidum de Deip videlicet pro quolibet dolio duos francos et
duos le Sous' Cum dimidio et cetera Sibi quibus dictus Jacobus peciit Instrumentum Actum erunt
infra dictum pretorium huismodi xj' ante merediem presentibus gilberto menyeis preposito patricio
leslie balliuo Johanne Cullane Duncano fyf Duncano craik burgensibus Willelmo scrimgeour sergeando

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die mensis Ja
nuarij anno quo Supra

The said' day Robert of murray tuk to preiwe this day xxtj dais that he bocht
the cowntour' clamit be Dauid mar' fra mathou rede and falyeing tharof he sale
deliuer the said' countour to the said' Dauid

The said' day the balyeis chargit Norman leslie and Johne Cuk sergeandis to
pay to Jonhne of meldrum vij s' within terme of law for quhit wyn'
and maluasy resauit fra him and gevin to my lord of Craufurd'

The said' day Duncan Wandy alias andirsone one that ane part Ande thomas lammynton'
one that vthir oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' and abid' at
the decret and ordinance of Jonhne Colisone Duncan colisone Androw fyf ande
Duncan fyf Anent ale debatis and actionis debatable betuix thame

The said' day forsy the relict of William hay grauntit scho hed' resauit ane
curche of Duncan crakis wiffis quhilkis the balyeis chargit hir' to deliuer within
terme of law

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die
mensis Januarij Anno dominj millesimo quingentesimo Nono

The said day the Prouost and bailyeis chargeit Androw Waus to freitht and
releif Walter cullane of x s' of anuell awand' to the freris predicatouris of
the hous pertening to the said Walter quhilk the said Androw occupijs within terme of law

The said day the bailyeis chargit henry Walcar to Remain within the tolbutht
vnto the tyme he content and pay to Wilyeame Walcar xij s' for a barrell
of ry for he quhilkis the said henry drew him Souerte to ser Dauy leis
factour to the Aldirman for the said ry siluer becaus It was refferit to the said
Wilyeame Walcaris aitht

The said day charlis stevinsone referrit til alexander malisonis aitht
gif the said alexander come souerte for thomas lesly to his wif for half ane
cobill hir quhilk alexander deponit that he come' Neuire souerte to the said
charlis nor' his wif nor nain vthiris for the said' cobill hir

The said day the borgh' fundin be Johnne' Arthour' on' Joh Androu Waus
that quhar he deliuerit thretty schoir of lous' skynis to him and his clerk he has
gottin thar of bot tueynti sevin schoir agane and he has tane haile fraucht and lote
and aucht to deliuer hym the said skynis or ellis lote thar for as corrispondent as
nychtbour and wyn dois was fundin awail for the quhilk the said androw was in
amerciament of the court and aucht to deliuer the said skynnis to the said Johnne

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Octauo die mensis
februarij Anno quingentesimo nono

The said day ormond' lesly officiar grantit him awand to Johnne brabnir
iij s' of siluer quhilkis the bailye chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The said day the bailyeis assignit mononday that nixt cummis to Duncan fif
forspekar for robert riburne to comper befor thame for ane Inquiscioun'
to be takin gif he be nerrest and lauchfull' ayr to Katherin flessar his modir

The said day Wilyeame mylne at the Justice mylnis grantit him awand'
to Robert Waus tua bollis of malt quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law And the said Wilyeame allegijt the said robert was awand'
him vj s' and vj d'

The said day Johnne colisoun' grantit him awand' to Duncan fif ix s' quhilkis
the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne cullan forspekar that
Ormond' lesly officiar sall do his deligence betuix this and the law day eftir pasche
to get witting be cursing or vthirwais for ane pewter plait pertenyng to Johnne
brabnire gif he may get it betuix this and the said tyme And gif he can nocht get the
said plat to recompens to the said plait to the said Johnne'

The said day it was deliuerit be the said assis' John Cullan forspekar that Johnne crag the clerk to Johnne
growell franchman and the said Johnne sall pas amang the merchand men that had
appilllis in the said francheman and tak samekle' fra ilkan of thame as will correspond'
for thar part of ane barrell of apillis and' mak mastir Dauy lousonys to be
content and pait tharof

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne cullan forspekar
that thomas riddaill sall preive one monday that nixt cummys that Donald' Kemp
gef him the hart hid followit be Androw Waus and' gif he failyeis in his
preif he sall pay the said hid'

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johnne ramsay
to bring his warand' quhilk he allegiit to anent xv s' of siluer
clamyt be Duncan' andersoune'

Eodem die Duncanus fif constituit creauit et ordinauit Johannem Arthour
suum procuratorem ad recipiendum ad recu a Johnanne colisoun' ix s' monete
scocie Et in omnibus aliis suis actionibus quibuscumque sibi concernens Promittens
se Ratum gratum et cetera

The said day It was deiuerit be the said assis' Johnne cullan' forspekar that the
clerk of Johnne growell schip quhilk resauit his fraucht and the said Johnne
sale pas to the merchandis quhilk haid appillis in the said schip and tak fra
Ilk ane' of tham' samekle' as wile corrsiponde and ansuer' to thar part of ane
berrell of appillis and mak mastir Dauid lowsone be content and pait thar of

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdein' tenta In pretorio eusdme vndecimo
die mensis februarij Anno quosupra

Eodem die compertum est fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem per
subscriptum videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd militem Johannem Colisoun' Duncanum
colisoun' Johannem blak Willelmum murray alexandrum gray Dauid mar
Johannem arthoure Dauid fynne Robertum crag georgeum bissat
Dauid' straloche Johannem Kintor allanum litster Johannem crag' Dauid
mar Juniorem et gilbertum litstar burgensis dictj burgj quod Robertus
Raburne est legittimis et propinquior heres quondam Katherine flessar
sponse sue matris sue

The said day Johnne Colisone bailye commandit gilbert Tulideff baxtar
to ressaue and tak fra Johnne blak ane barrell of quheit and pay
hym the money tharfor siclik as he pait for the laif of the quheit that
he bocht fra the said Johnne

The said day Androu stratoun' was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Johnne
of cullane forspekar for the tribulance of Dauid andersoun' younger In
word' and deid' And the said Dauid andersoun' was conuict' for the strublance
of the said Androu ffor the quhilkis ilkane of thame was in amerciament of
the court and till amend' as law will and forber in tyme tocum And
was gevin for dome'

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimooctauo
die mensis februarij anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day the bailyeis chargit Robert Joffray to content and pay to John
Wilyongsone vij s' vj d' and iij sprvs schillingis becaus the said robert
referrit to the said Johnnez' aitht gif he aucht him the said money or nocht

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem curie quod magister
thomas chamer est legittimus et propinquior heredes heres quondam thome chamere
patris suj Ideo precipitur balliuis in mandatum ad cognoscendum ipsum magistrum thomam
ad terras et annuos redditus in terr' quibus dictus quondam pater suis obijt
vestitus et sasitus et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo septimo
die mensis februarij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Nono

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday the fiftene day of the moneth of marche nixt
to Cum to geroge talyour' tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne arthour
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xiij li' vj s' et viiij d' vsuale money of Scotland'
of lent money and merchandice

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis marcij
Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo Nono

The said day Thomas Bisset grantit him awand' to georg reid vij s' viij d'
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay withtin terme of law

The said day alexander malisone grantit the decret producit and gevin In be
charlis stevinsone and all thingis contenit in It And in continent comperit the said
alexander and said he wald stand' at the said decret sa the personis being in it war suorn'

The said day Robert murray lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit to haue ansuerit
at the Instance of Robert piper for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court

The said day Wilyeame logane one that ane part and Johnne Kennerty one
that vthir part oblist thame be the fathis of thar bodijs the greit aitht suorne'
to stand and abid' at the finall ordinance and decreit of Johnne colison' thomas
Waus Wilyeame boll and androw Waus anent all strublance of new and auld'
movit ony tymes bigane betuix thame

The said day Robert barbour tuk him to preif one monunday that next cummys
that Jok Watsone was awand' him ij s' of silueris

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
marcij anno quo Supra

The said' day William bole grauntit him aving to Robert hile xxvij pundis
vsuale money of Scotlande quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of lawe

The saide day Jonhne Cuk askit thomas Wode his maile of his berne
of thre termes bigane and the said' thomas graunit and saide he suld'
pay him quhat euire it be at he p is aving

The said' day thomas ridale grauntit to pay iiijor s' to Sandy brabnire
in his wiffis behalf within terme of lawe

The said' day Robert barbour' falyeit in his preiwe of ij s' clamit
aving to him be Jonhne Watsone et cetera

head.add: The prising of certan clat to Duncane wandy

div.p:
The saide day normond' leslie officiar present tua pecis of clatht ane of
blak contening iiijor elne and j quartar Ande ane of grene contening sex elnez'
quhilkis clatht was deliuer to him to ger present the kingis commone mercat
iiij mercat dais and the ferde day to be sellit for the Some of Nyntene
Schillingis of maile and sevintene schillingis for walde aving to Duncan
Wandy be Richerde litstar in the gallougate Ande comperit Jonhne frostar
Johne glas' ande Duncan byschope quhilkis deponit the gret aithe that
ye saw the said' normond' present the said' tua pecis of clatht to the
kingis mercate iiijor mercatis dais immediate bigane and the last day the
said' clath thai prisit to iiijor s' Ilkane eln' tharfor the balyeis ordanit
and chargit the saide officiar' to pas' and peroffer the said' clatht to the saide Richerd'
of the saide price Ande gif he refusit it to Sele It tile ony persone that wald'
by it Ande deliuer the ourcumyn' and excrescence tharof to the said' Richerde
the said' Duncance being pait Ande gif he cane fynd nay mane to by it to deliuer it
to the saide Duncan one the saide price and deliuer the excrescence tharof to the saide Richerde

The saide day Normonde leslie officiar presentit tua par' of Splentis deliuerit and resauit
fra Jonhne low smytht to be prisit and Sellit eftir the law of the burghe' that is to say
to present thame to the kingis common mercat four' mercat dais and the ferd' mercat day to
ger pris' thame be suorne prisaris for the pament of viij s' aucht to Androw litstar Ande thareftir
comperit thomas Ridale gilbert prestone and bischoipe quhilkis deponit the gret aithe
that thai saw the saide Normonde leslie present the saide tua par splentis to the kingis common
mercat of the saide burghe four' mercat lauchfull dais last bigane Ande the last of the
saide iiijor mercat dais thai prisit the saide tua par' splentis to iiijor s' for the quhilkis
the balyeis chargit the said officiar' to pas and offir the said tua par' splentis to the said
Androw for the pament of the said iiij s' that thai war' apprisit for gif the saide Johne Wald'
nocht lous' and redemp thame Ande becaus' the saide Johne Walde nocht redempe tham the saide
officiar' deliuerit thame to the saide Androw one the said price And' atour the balyeis ordanit him
to pas' compele and distrenye the saide Johne and his gudis for the Remanent of the said viij s' and
the expensis maid tharapon' and mak the said Androw be content and pait tharof according to Justice
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die mensis marcij anno quo supra

the saide day Alexander coupar grauntit him avande to William boll xxviij s'
quhilkis the saide alexander oblist him to pay to Robert hill assignay in that part
to the saide William at the fest of Witsonday nixt hereftir

The said' day Sandy brovne grauntit suppos' he said' he suld' tak Jonhne of Ratre
be the feit and Jawe his harnes to wale he thocht nocht to do It

The saide day thome byris lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be Richerde litstar fo the wranguis' withhaldin fra
him of xix s' of money eftir the writin in his compt buk tharfor the balyeis
chargt Androw nachtj officiar to tak ane stres of the said' thomas and lat it to borghe
gif it be askit and warne him to comper one monunday that next cumis to ansuer
to the said' borghe
